oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-01-25 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 25, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Stonewall Jackson (his first appearance on the network portion), and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 955th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Rod Brasfield; Stonewall Jackson; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- I'm Moving On (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Stonewall Jackson -- (You're Right) I Need You Real Bad (Stonewall Jackson) -- Prince Albert commercial (Rod Brasfield, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Tommy Jackson -- Cripple Creek (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Hank Snow talks -- He'll Understand And Say Well Done (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow and Grant Turner introduce Chet Atkins -- Twelfth Street Rag (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Snow, Hank; Jackson, Stonewall
